eventForm.detailsPlaceholder: Add details about your event so that other users can know what it is about...

createEventTypeModal.title: Event type
createEventTypeModal.description: Select the type of event that best describes your activity.

createEventTicketModal.title: Set up the ticket
createEventTicketModal.description: Customize the ticket, its price, and available quantity.

noStripe.title: Set up your account to sell paid tickets.
noStripe.description: To create paid tickets, you must have payments enabled in your account. Go to your settings to do so.

stripeNotEnabled.title: Charges not enabled
stripeNotEnabled.description: To offer paid tickets, your Stripe account must be verified and enabled for charges. Check your Stripe settings.

createEventTerrainModal.title: Terrain type
createEventTerrainModal.description: This information will help give visibility to your event.

createEventExperienceModal.title: Desired experience
createEventExperienceModal.description: This information will help give visibility to your event.
